reviewText:
I have read so many different books and watched so many different videos that didn't answer the questions I had. Most of them teach you how to train your dog to hunt not trial/test. Or they would tell you to get your dogs out on as many wild birds as possible, which is an impossibility for me. There are basically four steps to his method and you just work through them.
- Basic obedience
- Whoa table
- Force fetch
- Steady to wing and shot

This is a rather old vhs tape transferred to dvd.  As a result the picture quality sucks.  There is some interesting info in the video, but there is no ecollar segment.
Basically, it is not bad, but very out of date.
